name: Solitaire Bliss Collection
description: Take a break and enjoy Solitaire Bliss Collection - the ultimate Solitaire collection with over 100 variants in one bundle, including all-time classics like Klondike, Spider Solitaire, Freecell, Tripeaks and Pyramid Solitaire.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 / 8 / 7 Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 / 8 / 7 Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 300 MB available space
